item.title: Welcome to Security Research
item.description: An introduction to this security research blog and what you can expect to find here.

item.title: Stack-Based Buffer Overflow Fundamentals
item.description: Introduction to stack-based buffer overflow vulnerabilities and basic exploitation techniques.

item.title: Linux Kernel Heap Exploitation in 2024
item.description: Deep dive into modern Linux kernel heap exploitation techniques, covering SLUB allocator internals and bypass methods for current mitigations.

item.title: Sample Research Post
item.description: This is a sample research post to demonstrate the layout and structure.

item.title: MACHSEC
item.description: This article explains my new mitigtion detection tool machsec, for iOS/macOS, alongside binary mitigations available on XNU

item.title: kernel-nightmare
item.description: Linux kernel module exploitation challenge requiring privilege escalation through race condition exploitation.

item.title: heap-heaven
item.description: Advanced heap exploitation challenge involving tcache poisoning and arbitrary write primitive.

item.title: vm-escape
item.description: Custom virtual machine reversing challenge requiring escape from sandboxed environment.
